name: Ultimate Logic Puzzle Collection
description:
Ultimate Logic Puzzle Collection contains 50 types of Logic Puzzles.

Features:
  • Weekly puzzles: new puzzles for every type every week
  • Tons of puzzles guarenteed to have only one solution
  • Autosave the process of unfinished levels
  • Record best completion time for each level
  • Trial mode
  • Undo, Redo
  • Achievements
  • Leaderboard

Current Game Types:
  1. Enter Numbers type
    - Number Flow
    - Number Flow Plus
    - Ripple Effect
    - Makaro
    - Number Road
    - Descending
    - Sign In
  2. Paint Cells type
    - Find Squares
    - Crazy Pavement
    - Paint Area
    - Black Shot
    - Divided Rooms
    - Nondango
    - Number Cross
    - Water Fun
    - Island Country
    - Light and Shadow
    - Paint Maze
    - Canal View
    - One Liar
    - Paint Stripe
    - Stostone
  3. Connect Dots type
    - Color Pairs
    - Milk Tea
    - Coffee Milk
    - Volleyball
    - Number Link
    - Homecoming
    - Turn Once
    - Rectslider
  4. Trace Path type
    - Pure Loop
    - Entry Exit
    - Linesweeper
    - Moon Sun Loop
    - Koburin
    - Country Road
    - Black White Loop
  5. Divide Regions type
    - Number Area
    - Meadows
    - Free Three
    - Territory
    - Mat Cover
    - Fillmat
  6. Place Objects type
    - Triplets
    - Distant Vow
    - Moonlight
    - Gems and Stones
    - Roma
    - Yin Yang
    - Boxed

# Detailed description of the rule for each puzzle is included in the game.
